title: Enchanting Kundan Jhumka Earrings with Emerald Accent
materials: Base Metal Alloy with 22K Gold Plating
Cultured Pearls. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricate Kundan setting showcasing traditional floral and geometric motifs. The Jhumka bell is adorned with delicate filigree work and pearl drops. The design blends antique charm with a modern aesthetic, making it versatile for various occasions. Features floral motif base and circular motif body.
occasions: or adding a touch of regal elegance to any special event. Ideal for half-saree function or as a statement piece for a modern cocktail party.
description: These Kundan Jhumkas exude timeless elegance and are meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The combination of Kundan stones, Emerald accents, and pearl drops creates a captivating and sophisticated look. The high-quality materials and Hyderabadi polish ensure durability and lasting brilliance. These earrings capture the essence of South Indian heritage while remaining relevant to contemporary fashion.
